stage1.title: It's Yesterday Once More
stage1.description: Activate 10 tunes in the Serenitea Pot using the Euphonium Unbound furnishing series.

stage2.title: It's Yesterday Once More
stage2.description: Activate 30 tunes in the Serenitea Pot using the Euphonium Unbound furnishing series.

stage3.title: It's Yesterday Once More
stage3.description: Activate 60 tunes in the Serenitea Pot using the Euphonium Unbound furnishing series.
